content.text: Match ends, Atlético de Madrid 3, Villarreal 0.
Second Half ends, Atlético de Madrid 3, Villarreal 0.
Attempt missed. Nilmar (Villarreal) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Joan Oriol with a cross.
Attempt blocked. Joan Oriol (Villarreal) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Joselu.
Attempt missed. Gabi (Atlético de Madrid) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right from a direct free kick.

Attempt missed. Filipe Luis (Atlético de Madrid) left footed shot from more than 35 yards is high and wide to the left.

Goal!  Atlético de Madrid 3, Villarreal 0. Diego (Atlético de Madrid) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Filipe Luis with a through ball.
